pre_caption: In a wide, static shot, the scene is layered with depth. A blurred, dark fence occupies the immediate foreground at the bottom of the frame. In the middle ground, a passenger jet with its landing lights on is positioned on a runway in the right-center of the frame. To its left, a larger, parked airplane sits on the tarmac. A red and white lattice tower stands in the center-right, with a small, striped building at its base, positioned between the camera and the active runway.
